name: UpdateEnvironmentDataset
description:
Updates details of a specific environment dataset.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific dataset within an environment by specifying the project and dataset IDs.

parameters.name: dataset_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the specific dataset to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve the ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: environment_dataset_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the dataset details to update, such as id, name, description, metadata, timestamps, and other details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
